content: For release on delivery  12:15 p.m. EDT  October 18, 2018      Don’t Chase the Needles:    An Optimistic Assessment of the Economic Outlook and Monetary Policy    Remarks by     Randal K. Quarles     Vice Chairman for Supervision     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Economic Club of New York Luncheon     New York, New York                 October 18, 2018
